# password for local rpc autentication, so non root # user will not be able to issue command to the agent localpasswd=$RANDOM$RANDOM # save it in a local file for easy access later on # non .json file are not loaded by serf
$localpasswd
# only .json files are loaded by serf as configuration
{ "rpc_auth" : "$localpasswd" }
